summary:
*Attack on Titan* is a popular Japanese comic (manga) series written by Hajime Isayama. It tells the story of Eren Yeager, who wants to kill giant creatures called Titans after they destroy his home. The manga was published from 2009 to 2021 and has been adapted into an anime TV series with four seasons.

The story takes place in a world where people live inside walls to protect themselves from the Titans. Eren and his friends fight against these giants to survive and uncover the secrets of their world. The series has been a big hit and has won many awards.
title: Attack on Titan
